titles.title: A resolution relative to the death of Dr. Lloyd John Ogilvie, Former Chaplain of the United States Senate.
A resolution relative to the death of Dr. Lloyd John Ogilvie, Former Chaplain of the United States Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution declares that the Senate has heard with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the death of Dr. Lloyd John Ogilvie, former Chaplain of the Senate.
